review: Once I figured out that using the enclosed adapter made it work better, all was good! I love how quick and responsive this is!
author: Jeannine L. McCarty

review: Love it. Our TV is not new, but was ahead of technology when we purchased it from Circuit City. Remember them. The fire stick gives us wide range of TV beyond only Netflix. Wish we done it sooner.
author: Josephine Gamboa-Montgomery

review: So Fast response, easy GUI and installed in minutes
author: rebeccc

review: Works great but I guess I assumed more shows and movies would be free.also can't get Netflix to work just yet
author: saskia gagne

review: I cut the cable! Yay! I love it!
author: Mary L. Hauser "maryisme247"

review: disappointed with choice of movies. Most of the movies we were interested in watching are not in Prime. Most family oriented movies were PG13 other than some boring cartoon choices.  Definitely not what we expected.
author: LH

review: Getting rid of my Direct TV ( too many commercials- too spendy ) This fire tv stick fills the whole family's needs. So happy my son informed me of this option
author: Stacy L

review: Works great, easy set up. I like that I can use my sling player on it, which I never could with my Roku.  Will be nice when more apps become available.
author: Mag

review: Got what i wanted and more...
author: Alex R
